subject: Shea Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In a bittersweet farewell to Shea Stadium, Mets fans chanted and cheered for players from the past, while pushing aside the failure of the 2008 season.
snippet: In a bittersweet farewell to Shea Stadium, Mets fans chanted and cheered for players from the past, while pushing aside the failure of the 2008 season.
